## Evaluation of Survey Results

During the P6W4 and P7W1 weeks it was conducted a survey with the Value Stream associates and temporary workers and the maintenance team.

This presentation brings the analysis of the survey results.

## Responses

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(patchwork)

source("R/survey_read_data.R")
source("R/survey_plot.R")

folder = "/Users/marcos.abreu/workspace/survey-mars/data"
survey_data <- readSurveyMonkeyData(folder, "Java - Feedback.xlsx")

extra_columns <- 
  survey_data |> 
  select(`Onde vocÃª atua?`,
         `Qual seu turno?`,
         `Qual seu tipo de contrato?`) |> 
  names()
names(extra_columns) <- c('linha', 'turno', 'contrato')

dist_df <- get_respondent_data(survey_data, extra_columns)

plot_linha <- 
  dist_df |> plot_survey_by(linha)
plot_turno <- 
  dist_df |> plot_survey_by(turno)
plot_contrato <- 
  dist_df |> plot_survey_by(contrato)

plot <- ((plot_linha+ggtitle("")) + (plot_turno+ggtitle(""))) / (plot_contrato+ggtitle("")+coord_flip()) 
plot + plot_annotation(
  title = 'Number of answers',
  subtitle = 'Status 2023-06-22',
  caption = 'Disclaimer: partial data'
)
```
